kenticocommunity.qandaanswerdata.QAndAAnswerDataContent:
Brenden is correct 👍.
[Follow the docs](https://docs.kentico.com/x/1oouCw) or look at examples [in our open-source integrations](https://github.com/Kentico/xperience-by-kentico-lucene/blob/v11.0.1/src/Kentico.Xperience.Lucene.Admin/UIPages/IndexListingPage.cs#L24) or the [Kentico Community Portal source code](https://github.com/Kentico/community-portal/blob/v30.1.0.1/src/Kentico.Community.Portal.Admin/Features/QAndA/QAndAListingPage.cs).
Not all of the React components used in the administration UI are available for developers to use directly from our npm packages.
